content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x) for coal extraction

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z) for crafting iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace at position x to the assembling machine at position z

### Iron stick factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position c) for crafting iron sticks
- Inserter (position d) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position e) that connects the furnace at position x to the assembling machine at position c

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient materials
- Ensure you have enough required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when trying to craft items without the necessary machines
- Verify that you have the correct crafting machines or furnaces available for the items you wish to craft.
